explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an intelligent auditing solution using machine learning techniques, specifically BiLSTM neural networks.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep learning methods, such as BiLSTM, for text classification and feature extraction.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses BiLSTM, a type of neural network, for classifying audit problems.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions the use of Bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (BiLSTM) for text classification.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses BiLSTM, which is a variant of LSTM, for processing sequential data in audit reports.
explanations.classification: The paper discusses the classification of audit problems using BiLSTM under different text feature extraction methods.
explanations.clustering: The paper evaluates the performance of the COWORDS-IOM algorithm in the aggregate clustering of accounting vouchers.
explanations.feature representation: The paper involves text feature extraction methods, which are related to feature representation in machine learning.
